message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $90 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $75?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I can't go all the way down to $75, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $82.50? It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $78?
